metadata.name: Azure Device No Longer Managed or Compliant
metadata.comment: Identifies when a device in azure is no longer managed or compliant

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(LOWER(message)) in ('device no longer compliant', 'device no longer managed'))

output.summary: Identifies when a device in azure is no longer managed or compliant

metadata.objective: False positive: Administrator may have forgotten to review the device. Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/identity/monitoring-health/reference-audit-activities#core-directory
